aim4.util

Class TiledAreaOriginal

  • java.lang.Object
    • aim4.util.TiledAreaOriginal

  • public class TiledAreaOriginal
extends java.lang.Object
    A tiled area - a subdivision of an area into a grid of small rectangles.
